# C# Giveaway (by [TerrierDarts](https://www.twitch.tv/TerrierDarts))

## Description
With this extension you can run giveaways that are all built in C# no need for a text file.

## Import Code
```

```

All code should compile, if it does not compile please reach out in discord. (Link found on Home Page)

## Installation
In Streamer.bot in select `Import` from the top left.
Copy the `Import Code` and paste it into the `Import String`. 

The following chat commands will be imported too, if you have any duplicates or wish to change them here how they are set up. 
|Command|Action Tied to|
|---|---|
|`!opengiveaway`| 1. Open Giveaway|
|`!giveaway` |2. Giveaway |
|`!pausegiveaway` |3. Pause Joins |
|`!resumegiveaway` |4. Resume Joins |
|`!pullgiveaway` |5. Pull A Winner |
|`!cleargiveaway` |6. Clear The Giveaway |

You will need to create a `Timed Action` and tie it to `7. Timed Action` and have it repeat at an interval of your choosing.

## Configuration

This giveaway since in C# has settings in most of the actions, if any of these setting are repeated you will need to make sure that they match. All settings are changed by adjusting the Set Argument Sub-Action. Here is a run down of all the settings in each Action.

### 2. Join Giveaway
|Setting|Purpose|
|---|---|
|`base`| This is the base number of enteries will get if they are not Sub, Mod or VIP.
|`subs`| This is the number of entries a Sub will get.
|`vip`| This is the number of entries a VIP or MOD will get.

> If a user is both Sub and VIP/MOD the number of entries will be which ever is bigger. {.is-info}

### 5. Pull a Winner
|Setting|Purpose|
|---|---|
|`remove`| This controls if a user, who has been pulled out, is removed from the giveaway or not. This is useful if you have several prizes to giveaway over the course of a stream. 

### 7. Timed Message
|Setting|Purpose|
|---|---|
|`prize`| This is the prize that is been given away.|
|`base`| This is the base number of enteries will get if they are not Sub, Mod or VIP.|
|`subs`| This is the number of entries a Sub will get.|
|`vip`| This is the number of entries a VIP or MOD will get.|
|`trigger`| This is how you want the users to join.. i.e `!enter`,`!giveaway`, `Use Channel Points`
